name: Add-Invaders
description:
A mathematical twist on the space invaders formula...

Update: Chunky bois appear at level 12 and higher

How to Play:
Input the sum of the numbers shown above an enemy to hurt them. Add in order to stay alive!!

Features:

  • Move around the number pad even outside of the starting area
  • Play using touchscreen, mouse, keyboard or any combination of these!!
  • Dark Mode available

Story:
You are the new guy on the block. Apparently the citizens of this city are a bunch of weirdos trying to break in and steal your precious cane sugar. Knock them out with tiny rocks and the power of addition!!

Music by Patrick de Arteaga
